definition: teahouse/tea-stall with seats/tea-garden or teahouse seat
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: Installation of terrasses in a side-alley.
sentences.chinese: 沿小巷設置的露天茶座。

sentences.english: The teahouse facing the sea is but the best place to enjoy sunset and ocean wave.
sentences.chinese: 臨海的茶座，則是欣賞日落及濤聲拍岸的好地方。

sentences.english: And when they do, they have to stand at a table outside the cafeterias.
sentences.chinese: 當他們這樣做，他們站在一張桌子外的露天茶座。

definition: private room (in a restaurant, or for karaoke etc)/parlor/booth/compartment
compartment (of train, ship etc)/private room at restaurant/rented room for karaoke/hotel room rented by the hour
private room (in a restaurant, bath house, etc)
box (in a theater or concert hall)/private room (in a restaurant or karaoke)
customer area of a store/showroom/dining area of a restaurant
